snippet: Ms. Munro was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature for her masterly short stories, a body of work that has deepened and widened over her career.
abstract: Editorial praises the writing of author Alice Munro, who was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature; holds what is most admirable in her work is the pace of her storytelling.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Munro was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature for her masterly short stories, a body of work that has deepened and widened over her career.

headline.main: A Nobel Prize for Alice Munro
headline.print_headline: A Nobel Prize for Alice Munro
